title: Bright Studio in Lakeview East
posting_body: This lovely bright studio has the classic appeal of burnished hardwood floors and airy, high ceilings.
Unique loft area can be used for storage or as a space saving sleeping area.
On site laundry make it comfortable, convenient living.
This lovely bright studio has the classic appeal of burnished hardwood floors and airy, high ceilings.
Unique loft area can be used for storage or as a space-saving sleeping area.
This studio is currently under renovation and will display a similar kitchen and bath as shown in the photos.
On-site laundry makes it comfortable, convenient living.
We offer a hassle-free full online leasing process featuring online applications, lease signing, and payment options.
Advertised rent prices are subject to change without notice!
